Name: Medium Melee Weapon Proficiency
Description: You can effectively wield Medium melee weapons.

Name: Heavy Melee Weapon Proficiency
Description: You can effectively wield Heavy melee weapons.

Name: Light Bow Proficiency
Description: You can effectively wield Light Bows, Slingshots and Crossbows.

Name: Heavy Bow Proficiency
Description: You can effectively wield Heavy Bows and Crossbows.

Name: Light Firearm Proficiency
Description: You can effectively wield Light Firearms.

Name: Heavy Firearm Proficiency
Description: You can effectively wield Heavy Firearms.

Name: Medium Armor Training
Description: You can equip Medium armor. While wearing it, gain +1 Athletics.

Name: Heavy Armor Training
Description: You can equip Heavy armor. While wearing it, gain -1 Reflex.

Name: Shield Training
Description: While you have a shield equipped at the start of combat, gain Guard equal to your level.

Name: Heavy Guard
Description: When wearing Heavy armor and using a shield, gain +2 Armor.

Name: Travelerâ€™s Endurance
Description: +1 Speed; ignore the first level of Fatigue.

Name: Arcane Student
Description: Gain access to Arcane Spellcasting. You learn 1 spell per level from the Arcane list and learn 2 Arcane cantrips.

Name: Divine Initiate
Description: Gain access to Divine Spellcasting. You learn 1 spell per level from the Divine list and learn 2 Divine cantrips.

Name: Cosmic Novice
Description: Gain access to Cosmic Spellcasting. You cannot learn spells above level 1. Higher-level mana can cast multiple level 1 spells at once.

Name: Occult Apprentice
Description: Gain access to Occult Spellcasting. You cannot learn spells above level 2. Higher-level mana only upcasts. You learn 2 Occult cantrips.

Name: Elementalistâ€™s Spark
Description: Gain access to Elemental Spellcasting. Choose one element; spells of that element deal +1 damage (+1 more at levels 3, 6, 9, 12). You learn 2 Elemental cantrips.

Name: Cantrip Adept
Description: You learn 2 additional cantrips from your chosen spellcasting type.

Name: Quick Reflexes
Description: Reduce incoming damage by half your level (minimum 1). Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 3] | 3 [lvl 6] | 4 [lvl 9]

Name: Cantrip Knowledge
Description: Convert one level 1 spell from your spellcasting type into a cantrip.

Name: Minor Channeling
Description: Cast one level 1 spell without spending Mana. Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 3] | 3 [lvl 6] | 4 [lvl 9]

Name: Chef
Description: Cook allies a meal during a rest. Eating grants +2 Accuracy or +1 Armor next combat (+1 more at levels 3, 6, 9, 12).

Name: Tavern Brawler
Description: Gain proficiency with improvised weaponry; it deals 1 additional damage.

Name: Miner
Description: Identify and extract minerals. Deal +1 damage to constructs and stone enemies. Ignore disadvantages from non-magical darkness (+1 more at levels 3, 6, 9, 12).

Name: Brewer
Description: During a rest, create a potion per ally from your known potion list. Learn 2 potion recipes; each additional pick grants 1 more.

Name: Fisher
Description: When resting near water, regain +50% Health. While fishing, guarantee treasure worth at least 2 gold (+1 gold at levels 3, 6, 9, 12).

Name: Storyteller
Description: Tell a tale; allies gain 1 Grace at the start of next combat and remove a mental condition. Gain +1 Scholarship.

Name: Gravedigger
Description: During a rest, burying a dead ally grants Grace equal to remaining allies next combat; burying an enemy restores Health equal to allies Ã— level.

Name: Bardic Drunk
Description: While intoxicated, gain +1 Damage and -2 Accuracy (+1 Damage at levels 3, 6, 9, 12).

Name: Hermit
Description: Recover +2 Health when resting alone. While no allies are within 2 units, gain +2 Accuracy or +1 Armor (+1 at levels 3, 6, 9, 12).

Name: Street Performer
Description: Performing earns rewards worth 2 gold. Performing in combat grants allies within 5 units +2 Accuracy (+1 gold at levels 3, 6, 9, 12). Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 3] | 3 [lvl 6] | 4 [lvl 9]

Name: Candle Keeper
Description: Light sources you hold never go out. While lit, gain +1 Insight and +1 Reflex.

Name: Combat Trapper
Description: Create traps using components: Common creates a damaging snare; Rope creates a Bola ranged trap (+1 damage at levels 3, 6, 9, 12).

Name: Conductive Wiring
Description: Using metal wire, create lightning fences that deal damage once and stun creatures below half health. Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 3] | 3 [lvl 6] | 4 [lvl 9]

Name: Survivalist
Description: Gain +1 Accuracy against beasts and natural creatures (+1 at levels 3, 6, 9, 12). Gain advantage on Insight, Reflex, and Fortitude checks in natural environments.

Name: Tracer Shot
Description: Fire a glowing projectile; allies gain +1 Accuracy against the marked target (+1 more at levels 3, 6, 9, 12). Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 3] | 3 [lvl 6] | 4 [lvl 9]

Name: Non-lethal Shot
Description: You can choose to deal non-lethal damage with ranged attacks.

Name: Arcane Edge
Description: If you cast a spell and strike with a melee attack in the same turn, the attack deals +1 damage (+1 more at levels 3, 6, 9, 12).

Name: Elemental Draw
Description: Your next attack deals +1 elemental damage of a chosen type (+1 at levels 3, 6, 9, 12). Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 3] | 3 [lvl 6] | 4 [lvl 9]

Name: Mana Slash
Description: Spend Mana to empower an attack, adding damage based on Mana spent. Attack counts as magical. Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 3] | 3 [lvl 6] | 4 [lvl 9]

Name: Beast Whisperer
Description: You can tame animals or beasts to become companions (Narratorâ€™s discretion).

Name: Bonded Instinct
Description: Command your companion to attack the target you struck; it gains +2 Accuracy (+1 more at levels 3, 6, 9, 12).

Name: Spirit Bond
Description: When your companion is healed, you recover half the Health restored. You can see through your companion within 12 tiles.

Name: Noble Steed
Description: While riding your companion, gain +2 Armor. First damage taken each combat grants Guard equal to companionâ€™s Speed.

Name: Carapace
Description: While unarmored, gain +1 Armor (+1 more at levels 6 and 12).

Name: Forgotten History
Description: Gain +1 Scholarship when identifying historical objects (+1 more at levels 3, 6, 9, 12).

Name: Weakpoint
Description: Landing an attack grants +2 Accuracy against that target until combat ends (+1 more at levels 3, 6, 9, 12).

Name: Ancient Study
Parameters: â˜… Unbound â«˜ Occult Apprentice / Cosmic Novice
Description: Occult and Cosmic spells gain +1 Range. Learn 1 Occult cantrip and 1 Cosmic spell, bypassing type restrictions.

Name: Cowardâ€™s Instinct
Description: Gain +2 movement tiles while retreating or while feared.

Name: Master of Disguise
Description: Gain +1 Deception and Finesse while disguised or blending into crowds (+1 at levels 6 and 12).

Name: Leg Day
Description: Double movement until next turn; movement is halved the following turn. Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 3] | 3 [lvl 6] | 4 [lvl 9]

Name: Focused Strike
Description: The first melee hit each scene gains +1 Damage (+1 at levels 6 and 12).

Name: Hard Swing / Big Bonk
Description: Add +2 Damage to a melee attack. Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 6] | 3 [lvl 12]

Name: Focused Mind
Description: +1 to resist Charm, Fear, and Illusion effects.

Name: Spell Scribe
Description: Identifying a used spell grants +1 Spellcraft against that enemy, stacking up to 3 times.

Name: Ritualistâ€™s Patience
Description: Ritual spells take half the time and grant +2 Arcana on that spell (+1 at levels 3, 6, 9, 12).

Name: Pocket Sand
Description: As a reaction, blind an enemy entering melee range until their next turn. Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 3] | 3 [lvl 6] | 4 [lvl 9]

Name: Remote Activation
Description: Activate an allied mechanical device, trap, or gadget within 6 tiles as a free action.

Name: Reinforced Construction
Description: Crafts and modifications you create gain +2 Durability.

Name: Craftsman
Description: Learn 2 Trivial recipes. Additional picks unlock higher tiers and grant more recipes.

Name: Gearwright
Description: Repair one trivial or simple craft during a rest without a check.

Name: Field Mechanic
Description: Once per rest, repair a craft to full operation. Each craft can only benefit once. Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 3] | 3 [lvl 6] | 4 [lvl 9]

Name: Scrap Salvager
Description: Disassemble objects into components via Tinkering. Crafted items yield extra components.

Name: Arc Current
Description: Constructs can expend Durability to shock nearby targets, dealing Lightning Damage.

Name: Charged Conduit
Description: When casting a spell through a spellcasting craft, add +1 Damage (+1 at levels 6 and 12).

Name: Spell Interface
Description: Imbue a spell into a machine once per rest; it triggers based on declared conditions.

Name: Relentless Advance
Description: Moving into melee range of a new enemy grants +2 Accuracy for your next attack (+1 at levels 3, 6, 9, 12).

Name: Locksmith
Description: Open simple locks without tools; gain +1 Finesse (+1 at levels 6 and 12).

Name: Companion Recall
Description: Teleport your companion to your side and restore 2 Health to it. Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 3] | 3 [lvl 6] | 4 [lvl 9]

Name: Pathmaker
Description: Dash into a target within 3 units, dealing 1 Force damage. Damage applies only to enemies.

Name: Crippling Impact
Description: The target you dash to is slowed until your next turn and takes +1 Force damage.

Name: Crushing Impact
Description: The target you dash to takes +1 Force damage. If below half Health, they instead take +2 Force damage.

Name: Displacing Impact
Description: The target you dash through is pushed 3 units away in the direction of the dash and takes +1 Force damage.

Name: Switching Impact
Description: The target you dash to is swapped with your original position. If the target is an ally, they gain Guard equal to your level.

Name: Guarding Impact
Description: If you dash onto an ally, they gain Guard equal to your level; otherwise, you gain the Guard.

Name: Mana Charger
Description: You can charge devices or machines that require electrical power using Mana.

Name: Mechanical Assistant
Description: Using metal components, construct a small mechanical assistant that can carry, retrieve, or activate simple objects. It has 6 Durability, replenished each rest.

Name: Spell Drone
Description: Create a flying spell drone that stays within 3 units of you. You may cast spells from its position. It has 3 Durability, replenished each rest.

Name: Combat Rover
Description: Create a small combat rover that can be commanded to attack targets within 5 tiles, dealing 2 Damage. It has 3 Durability, replenished each rest.

Name: Dual Wielding
Description: You can wield two Light weapons. Off-hand attacks use all applicable modifiers.

Name: Dual Action
Description: Your companion makes a free attack against a target you hit.

Name: Second Strike
Description: After hitting with a melee attack, make another attack without expending an action.

Name: Guardianâ€™s Oath
Description: When an adjacent ally is attacked, take 2 damage to reduce that attackâ€™s damage by 3 (+1/+2 scaling at levels 3, 6, 9, 12).

Name: Mana Reservoir
Description: Gain a reservoir of 3 bonus Mana for level 1 spells. Can be used on level 2 spells starting at level 6.

Name: Unyielding Defense
Description: When at or below half Health, gain +2 Armor (+1 Armor at levels 6 and 12).

Name: Precision Form
Description: When your attack modifiers exceed half (rounded up) of the enemyâ€™s Armor, gain +2 Damage (+1 Damage at levels 6 and 12).

Name: Tactical Awareness
Description: Gain +2 Accuracy against enemies adjacent to your allies (+1 at levels 3, 6, 9, 12).

Name: Enduring Spirit
Description: When below half Health, gain Guard equal to half your level + 4 (+1 at levels 3, 6, 9, 12). Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 3] | 3 [lvl 6] | 4 [lvl 9]

Name: Steady Aim
Description: For each scene you do not take damage, gain +1 Accuracy, stacking infinitely.

Name: Channel Focus
Description: Casting a spell grants Guard equal to half your level. This refreshes but does not stack.

Name: Duelist Technique
Description: While wielding a single one-handed weapon, gain +1 Armor and +1 Reflex (+1 at levels 6 and 12).

Name: Crushing Blow
Description: Your next melee attack deals +2 Damage and you suffer -1 movement this turn (+1 Damage / -1 movement at levels 6 and 12). Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 6] | 3 [lvl 12]

Name: Executionerâ€™s Edge
Description: Deal +2 Damage to enemies at half Health or lower.

Name: Resolute Will
Description: Ignore the first negative condition each rest and gain +1 Fortitude.

Name: Perfectionist Strike
Description: On a hit, deal bonus Damage equal to the amount your attack exceeded the targetâ€™s Armor. On a miss, take Damage equal to half the amount missed. Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 3] | 3 [lvl 6] | 4 [lvl 9]

Name: Focus Breaker
Description: Damaging a spellcaster causes them to lose 1 Mana (doubled on Midnights).

Name: Adaptive Guard
Parameters: â«˜ Medium Armor Proficiency / Heavy Armor Proficiency
Description: If an enemy attacks you twice in one combat, gain +2 Armor against that enemy for the rest of combat (+1 at levels 6 and 12).

Name: Overcharged Weapon
Description: Spend up to your level in Health to deal half that amount (rounded up, minimum 1) as bonus Damage. Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 6] | 3 [lvl 12]

Name: Blacksmith
Description: Repair gear during rest. Restored gear gains +1 Damage or +1 Armor and 3 Durability before expiring. Gain +1 Tinkering (+1 at levels 6 and 12).

Name: Treasure Hunter
Description: Gain +1 Finesse for looting. Exploring new areas grants +2 Speed (+1 Speed at levels 6 and 12).

Name: Cartographer
Description: Gain advantage on Insight checks when recalling known locations. When resting in a previously visited area, you cannot be ambushed.

Name: Restorative Meditation
Description: Once per rest, recover 3 Mana (+1 at levels 3, 6, 9, 12).

Name: Focused Conduit
Description: Your first spell each combat costs no Mana and gains +2 Range.

Name: Mana Conservation
Description: When a spell is countered, regain its Mana cost plus 1.

Name: Mana Flow
Description: Slaying an enemy with a spell refunds its Mana cost.

Name: Spell Specialization
Description: Choose one known spell; it gains +2 Damage, Range, and Healing. Reduce known/prepared spells by 1. Effect stacks per pick.

Name: Aimed Shot
Description: Gain +2 Accuracy and +1 Damage (+1 Accuracy at levels 6 and 12). Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 6] | 3 [lvl 12]

Name: Quick Reload
Description: Reloading a firearm no longer costs an action.

Name: Tracking Expertise
Description: Identify tracks and movement signs. Gain +2 Insight against hidden or fleeing enemies (+1 at levels 6 and 12).

Name: Piercing Arrow
Description: Fire through up to two targets. The first target takes +2 Damage (+1 Damage at levels 6 and 12). Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 6] | 3 [lvl 12]

Name: Flashbang
Description: Create Flashbangs that impose -4 Accuracy in a 3-tile radius until the next turn. Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 3] | 3 [lvl 6] | 4 [lvl 9]

Name: Sudden Camouflage
Description: Hitting an enemy causes attacks against you to suffer -2 Accuracy (-1 at levels 6 and 12).

Name: Explosive Ammunition
Description: Your next ranged attack explodes in a 1-tile radius, dealing 1 Damage (+1 Damage at levels 3, 6, 9, 12). Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 3] | 3 [lvl 6] | 4 [lvl 9]

Name: Elemental Coating
Description: Modify one reload of ammunition to deal +1 Elemental Damage of a chosen type (+1 Damage at levels 6 and 12).

Name: Bounding Retreat
Description: After a ranged attack, move 3 tiles without provoking reactions.

Name: Crippling Shot
Description: Make a ranged attack that reduces target movement by 3 tiles for 1 turn (+1 turn at levels 3, 6, 9, 12). Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 3] | 3 [lvl 6] | 4 [lvl 9]

Name: Runic Impact
Description: When you hit with a melee attack, expend 1 Mana to trigger a level 1 spell at the hitâ€™s location.

Name: Runic Shot
Description: When you hit with a ranged attack, expend 1 Mana to trigger a level 1 spell at the hitâ€™s location.

Name: Ranged Conduit
Description: You may cast cantrips through ranged attacks. On activation, you may instead cast a level 1 spell for free. Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 6] | 3 [lvl 12]

Name: Spirit Conduit
Description: You may cast spells from your companionâ€™s position.

Name: Arcane Link
Description: Your companion gains a Mana pool of 4. You may spend its Mana while it is within 6 units of you.

Name: Unseen Strike
Description: The first melee attack each combat is an automatic hit if performed from behind or above (no Midnights).

Name: Quick Cast
Description: Cast one spell as a Free Action instead of an Action. Does not bypass attack limits. Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 6] | 3 [lvl 12]

Name: Spontaneous Insight
Description: Once per combat, reroll a die on any skill check. You gain only 1 Grace regardless of outcome.

Name: Duelistâ€™s Prowess
Description: While wielding a single one-handed weapon, your critical success range expands. Misses do not consume charges. Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 6] | 3 [lvl 12]

Name: Battlefield Awareness
Description: When an enemy moves adjacent, you may react to move 2 tiles without provoking attacks. Enemies within 10 tiles suffer stealth penalties equal to your Insight.

Name: Vanishing Act
Description: When you take damage, you may react to make an attack with halved Damage and move 2 tiles without provoking.

Name: Parry
Description: When hit by a melee (or ranged at level 6) attack, contest the roll with Athletics. On success, ignore the damage. Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 6] | 3 [lvl 12]

Name: Braced Stance
Description: You count as one size larger for grappling checks.

Name: Jury-Rig
Description: Restore a broken craft to 1 Durability for a scene. While active, it gains +2 Damage. Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 6] | 3 [lvl 12]

Name: Inventorâ€™s Focus
Description: Modify a mechanical or electrical item to gain +2 Accuracy or +2 Damage for one scene. Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 6] | 3 [lvl 12]

Name: Combat Engineer
Description: Deploy automated turrets that fire at the end of your turn. Turrets deal 1 Damage, have 3 Durability, and scale in uses. Uses ðŸ—²: 1 [lvl 1] | 2 [lvl 6] | 3 [lvl 12]
